Tests if glyph caches of different languages interfere.
On systems that the locales have different font preferences, the following divs should be displayed in corresponding preferred fonts respectively.
Default font-family:
Simplified Chinese: 誤過骨
Traditional Chinese: 誤過骨
Japanese: 誤過骨
Korean: 誤過骨
Generic font-family (sans-serif):
Simplified Chinese: 誤過骨
Traditional Chinese: 誤過骨
Japanese: 誤過骨
Korean: 誤過骨
Non-generic font-family (Times New Roman):
Simplified Chinese: 誤過骨
Traditional Chinese: 誤過骨
Japanese: 誤過骨
Korean: 誤過骨
